page.title: 14Rawreth Church Life.
page.content: The main Sunday service was Family Communion with Sunday School at 9.15, from A.S.B. rite A.The Rector said special prayers for those involved in the hijacking of the T.W.A. American airliner by Shi'ite Muslims and for the families of those still on board. Attending the service were 1 girl,5 boys,12 women and 6 men plus the Rector.Only 10 of those worshipping lived in the parish.Usually the attendance is better.Evensong at 6.30 was from the 1662 Book of Common Prayer.There was a congregation of 10. There were 15 people at the meeting point in the Rectory on June 18th, studying the Apostles Creed.7 boys attended Church School Club in the school on June 21st.On June 22nd was a wedding,the groom being a young man from Bedloes Avenue.The weather was fine,but not hot.
